thread.title: Jaimie Alexander flashes tattoos on set of Blindspot | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Jaimie Alexander flashes tattoos on set of Blindspot | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: Jaimie Alexander flashes tattoos on set of Blindspot | Daily Mail Online
text: comments Jaimie Alexander was back to work on the set of her hit show Blindspot on Wednesday. The 32-year-old actress was hard to miss as she sported a bold red outfit which flashed her fake tattoos for the NBC drama. Jaimie looked in great spirits as she was pictured in New York wearing a skimpy scarlet romper and knee-high boots. Bright and beautiful: Jaimie Alexander flashed her tattoos in a striking red outfit on Wednesday as she filmed scenes for Blindspot in New York A checked wool coat kept out the chill and she donned a snug infinity scarf for extra warmth. Blindspot centers around a beautiful woman (Jaimie) discovered naked in New York's Times Square with no memory of who she is or how she got there. With her body covered in tattoos the FBI soon discovers to intricate designs hold the secrets to her past. Caffeine fix: The 32-year-old star wore a red romper and checked jacket and scarf as she clutched a coffee in-between scenes Blindspot centers around a beautiful woman discovered naked in Times Square with no memory of who she is but covered in tattoos which provide clues to her background Meanwhile UFC star Ronda Rousey is set to join the show in a guest role. The 30-year-old athlete was left humiliated during a fight in December when she was TKO'd by Amanda Nunes within a minute. According to TMZ, Ronda will star as a 'tough prison inmate who's serving time for transporting weapons across state lines.' Ready for business: The actress was spotted with co-star Sullivan Stapleton as they were clad in dark hues for a scene The 32-year-old star showed off a large tattoo on her neck as she stepped out in a leather jacket and khaki t-shirt Hit show: Blindspot is currently in its second season airing on NBC Solving mysteries: Sullivan plays FBI agent Kurt Weller A rep for the show said Ronda's episode will air in May. She is yet to shoot her scenes. Jaimie is currently dating Airon Armstrong who is the stunt double to her co-star Sullivan. The actress shared a loved-up photo of the couple on the beach last week which she captioned 'Happy Valentine's Day' Loved up: Jaimie is currently dating Airon Armstrong who is the stunt double to her co-star Sullivan Share or comment on this article 85
